posts.post_content:
Signed T206 McBride
SOLD

[url]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg812/scaled.php?server=812&filename=imagepyg.jpg&xsize=640&ysize=480[/url]
[url]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg171/scaled.php?server=171&filename=imagephca.jpg&res=iphone[/url]

Guaranteed to pass with James Spence or PSA/DNA. 
I have 100% positive feedback on eBay and have sold hundreds of cards on the old Net54 board. I also sold a double signed Davy Jones t206 earlier this year. I can email you larger pics if needed. 

Thanks,
Ray Piskadlo
[url]Rpiskadlo@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks for the quick responses, but first offer was accepted. 

Ray
